A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Horrible!!  Huge plot holes and worthless\, flat\, boring characters from Rian Johnson.

My apologies to George Lucas!  I should not have criticized your prequels as they are 1000 times better than Rian Johnson's garbage of a movie.

Unless Disney apologizes and fires Rian Johnson from any further SW movies\, I'm done!!
